REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1568 reute r f BC-IRISH-INDUSTRIAL-PROD 03-23 0053

TEXT.TITLE: IRISH INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION INDEX UP 6.2 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Ireland's industrial production index stood at 132.8 in December, a year-on-year rise of 6.2 pct, the Central Statistics Bureau reported. In November the index, base 1980, stood at 144.8, showing a rise of 4.3 pct on a year-on-year basis. REUTER
